name: Jerboa
speech: I deserve this.
My punishment is justified.
I regret what I did.
They showed me mercy. I should've been shot.

name: Tomato
speech: I want to die.
Why does everyone make me work?

name: Tephra
speech: This camp is going down with me.
I will burn this place down.
I'm so scared.

name: Ribbon
speech: I could be baking right now.
I want to go home.
Can I make some mud pie out of all this dirt?

name: Cosmo
speech: Jerboa is lying his ass out.
They're lying when they told me I could get out on good behavior.
I'm going to be here till I die.
My hands are too delicate for this.

name: Sparky
speech: Motherfuckers! Y'all a bunch of motherfuckers!
I want some tofu.
I'm so hungry.
I don't deserve this.
I can kill all of you here single-handed.
